price: 37. alors, ce jour-là, chacun d’entre eux sera préoccupé par ce qui le concerne.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
